samples: Can you describe your work as a Data Scientist

responses: My career as a Data Scientist at BallSquad from April 2022 to June 2023 in Warsaw, Poland, was marked by significant achievements. I developed a geographical web application using R Shiny, centralized data on public sports facilities, and created a Python-based prediction model with a user-friendly RESTful API. I excelled in complex ETL tasks, migrating data from SQL to Network database, improving data access, and efficiency. I actively collected data and collaborated with the marketing team. I also established an independent cloud-based BI database system, enhancing internal query performance with a Python application. I prepared comprehensive reports, ensuring alignment with company objectives. Prior to BallSquad, I tutored statistics at FSEG Strasbourg and worked as a Stadium Host for My Hostess in Strasbourg, France. My career showcases a strong commitment to data-driven innovation, technical expertise, and effective collaboration.

I was a Data Scientist in Warsaw, Poland, from April 2022 to June 2023 At BallSquad. I created a geographical web app with R Shiny, predictive models in Python, and streamlined data management. Prior to this, I tutored statistics and worked as a Stadium Host. My career highlights my strong commitment to data-driven innovation and technical expertise
